name: handles-public-api
description: A downloadable and containerized decentralized API for Handles
author: Papa Goose <papa.goose@koralabs.io>

scripts.start: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=preview; export ENABLE_DATUM_ENDPOINT=true; cd dist && node express.js)
scripts.copy-dist-files: mkdir -p dist && cp rollup.package.json dist/package.json && cp docs/swagger.yml dist/swagger.yml && cp ./shell/setup_env.sh dist/setup_env.sh
scripts.build:ec2: npm run copy-dist-files && (cd dist && npm install && chmod +x ./setup_env.sh && ./setup_env.sh) && npm exec -c 'rollup -c rollup.ec2.config.js'
scripts.build:lambda: npm run copy-dist-files && (cd dist && npm install && chmod +x ./setup_env.sh && ./setup_env.sh) && npm exec -c 'rollup -c rollup.lambda.config.js'
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:production && docker build -t koralabs/handles-api .
scripts.dev:readonly: (export READ_ONLY_STORE=true; export PORT=3142; export NETWORK=mainnet; nodemon)
scripts.dev:mainnet: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=mainnet; npm run start:ogmios && nodemon)
scripts.dev:preprod: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=preprod; npm run start:ogmios && nodemon)
scripts.dev:preview: (export NODE_ENV=development; export NETWORK=preview; npm run start:ogmios && nodemon)
